name: lidify
tagline: A recommender service for generating personalized media suggestions
description: Lidify is a self-hosted LightFM-based recommender service for media or user-content platforms. It helps generate personalized suggestions based on user behavior and historical data within privacy-controlled environments.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted, No external tracking, Local processing. Keep user data private

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Content recommendations, User preferences, Historical data. Enhance your media platform

features.title: User Behavior
features.description: Interaction tracking, Preference learning, Pattern recognition. Understand user interests

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful endpoints, Easy integration, Custom implementations. Connect to any platform

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Fast inference, Scalable architecture, Efficient processing. Handle large catalogs
